bibl.title: Despatch from Ezekiel E. Smith to George L. Rives, April 1, 1889
Despatches from United States Consuls in Monrovia, 1852-1906

correspAction.roleName: U.S. Minister Resident and Consul General

div1.p: Consulate General, U. S. A. Monrovia, Liberia, April 1st, 1889
Mr. Ezekiel E. Smith To the Deartment of State.
Returns and reports for the quarter ended March 31st 1889.
Consulate General, U. S. A. Monrovia, Liberia, April 1st, 1889
Honorable George L. Rives Assistant Secretary of State, Wasington, D. C.
I hope the same may be found correct.
I am, sir, your obedient servant
Ezekiel E. Smith U.S. Consul Gen'l
1. Salary account. 2. account of Contingent expenses. 3. Digest of Invoice book. 4. Arrivals and departures of Am. vessels. 5. Voucher for rent 6. Voucher for postal expenses
